1.content:
A.) Sisters Kacy (10) and Lacy (8) are both pretty much each other's best friends, and love to explore new things.

B.) Sisters Tina (15) and Anna (9) aren't crazy close due to their age difference but both keep an eye on each other and have their backs.

C.) Sisters Dee (13) and Sarah (6) are loving sisters but recently have been growing apart.

D.) Sisters Kate (17) and Kelly (13) are step sisters that have only just met with in the last year.
1.title: Get to know the sisters!

choices: One of the girls is a bedwetter
One of the girls has an odd habit
One of the girls is much smaller for their age
11.content:
Kacy and Lacy are both live with their loving parents in normal suburbia. Kacy loves her 5th grade class and her friends as does Lacy loves her friends but isn't a huge fan of 3rd grade. Bothe girls love to explore the woods in back of their house, hang out around the neighborhood, and adventure together.

Now is everything normal before our story begins or no?
11.title: A

choices: Take a walk around the neighborhood
111.content: Kacy and Lacy are sitting in the kitchen, eating breakfast as they would do every morning. It's Saturday so they are free to spend the day doing what they wish, so right after finishing their breakfast they get dressed and decide to head out. First thing they decide to do is...
111.title: Normal let's start!

choices: They stumble across a Mysterious House
1111.content:
The two of them head off into the woods behind their house.

Do they find anything while Exploring?
1111.title: Explore the woods

11111.content: Both didn't recognize it. Curious, they entered. The first room they found was...
11111.title: They stumble across a Mysterious House

111111.content:
After entering the house the sisters spy 3 ways to go, left, right or Upstairs. Heading right they head into what appears to be a Kitchen.

Is there anything of interest in the kitchen?
111111.title: The kitchen

choices: A Young Woman, sitting at the table reading a book
1111111.content:
As soon as they get in the kitchen they encounter someone!

But who?
1111111.title: Someone's there!

choices: Baby Bottles full of what looks like Milk
Sippy Cups filled with what looks like apple juice
1111112.content:
The girls decide to look through the fridge.

Inside they find?
1111112.title: They look in the fridge

choices: They feel compelled to try some
They're really thirsty, so they try some
11111122.content:
Inside they first notice a few Sippy Cups, filled with what looks like Apple Juice.

Do they try some?
11111122.title: Sippy Cups filled with what looks like apple juice

111111222.content:
''Ugh, I'm so thirsty...'' Kacy says. ''So am I'' Lacy responds and opens up the fridge. ''Hey, there's some apple juice in there'' she says and takes out one of the sippy cups. ''But why is it in a sippy cup?'' Kacy asks. ''I dunno, does it matter?'' Lacy responds and is about to drink the juice when her sister stops her.

''Are you sure it's safe to drink that?'' ''Well it doesn't smell funny or anything and it's apple juice, so why not.'' Lacy says. ''I guess you're right, I mean what could happen...'' Kacy agrees. The girls drink their cups and...
111111222.title: They're really thirsty, so they try some

1111112222.content:
The sisters down the juice, Kasey(I'm spelling it like this now because Clarity) unscrews the top of hers, but Lacy doesn't mind the sippy cup.

As soon as the two of them finish drinking, they start feeling drowsy, and soon collapse into slumber.

When they wake up:
1111112222.title: They fall asleep

11111122223.content: Upon waking up, they find themselves:
11111122223.title: More Choices

choices: They're in one of their Rooms
111111222231.content: They've somehow returned to there house, but where?
111111222231.title: Back Home?

1111112222311.content:
They find themselves at home, in the Den.

Is there anything weird they notice, other than being back home suddenly?
1111112222311.title: They're In the Den

choices: For some reason people think they're babies!
11111122223112.content:
As the girls Groggily wake up they are confused as to what happened.

Rubbing their Eyes Kacey and Lacy look at their surroundings.

They recognize that they're in the den, but they also find that for some reason they're in a playpen.

Why are they in a playpen?
11111122223112.title: They're in a... Playpen?

111111222231121.content:
Upon seeing eachother the girls immediately notice somehting alarming!

They've Gotten Younger Somehow!

Is Kacy still older, or did the regression also change that?
111111222231121.title: They've Regressed!

1111112222311211.content: Are they still 2 years apart, or is the age gap smaller/larger?
1111112222311211.title: Kacy's still the Big Sister

11111122223112111.content: OK how old are they
11111122223112111.title: The Same

choices: Kacy is 5 lacy is 2 or younger
Kacy is 7 and lacy is 3 or 4
11111122223112112.content: Kacy is still older than lacy but how old are they?
11111122223112112.title: Bigger

1111112222311212.content:
They've regressed to the same age, making them Twins.

And that age is:
1111112222311212.title: They're now the Same Age

11111122223112121.content:
As Kacy and Lacy groggily wake up, The two of them find themselves back home in the den.

But for some reason they're in a playpen?

That's when the sisters look at eachother, and are shocked to see that the other has gotten younger!

They Simultaneously go "K/Lacy?" Confused, before realizing that they're in the same boat.

They've somehow both become 3 year olds!

That's when they notice:
11111122223112121.title: 3 Years Old

111111222231121211.content:
They then notice something different about their Undies.

Instead of Panties, they're wearing:
111111222231121211.title: Something about their Undies

choices: One or both of them is Already wet!
One or both of them needs to potty!
1111112222311212111.content:
Both girls are shocked as they soon notice the Poofiness between their legs.

They lift the hems of the Babyish Dresses they've found themselves in(which are identical save for color), and confirm their fear.

Both of them are wearing real baby diapers, cutesy designs and all.

What happens next?
1111112222311212111.title: Diapers!

11111122223112121111.content:
The girls then notice somehting else!

From experience with helping out with their baby cousin, they know about the Wetness indicator on Diapers.

Well it looks like someone wet themselves during their little nap.

Who was it?
11111122223112121111.title: One or both of them is Already wet!

choices: They DON'T like this one bit
They don't seem to mind it too much
111111222231121211113.content:
Not only are both of them in diapers, Both of them are in WET diapers.

Between Suddenly being Toddlers again, being in Diapers, and it looks like having wet them too?

How do the girls react?
111111222231121211113.title: Both of them are Wet

choices: They try to escape the playpen
They notice clean diapers inside the playpen
1111112222311212111131.content:
The girls quickly realize that the fact they're wearing diapers isn't the worst part. When they lift up their dresses they can clearly see that the wetness indicators have changed colors. And if that isn't enough to confirm it, the diapers also sag noticeably between their legs, clearly showing that they had been peed in.

Both girls are blushing with embarrassment and soon tears begin to fall down their cheeks. Now...
1111112222311212111131.title: They DON'T like this one bit

111111222231121211113131.content:
Apparently the Girls are Currently being Babysat.

Do they Recognize their Babysitter?
111111222231121211113131.title: A Babysitter

1111112222311212111131311.content: The Girls Recognize the person who's Babysitting them, But Why?
1111112222311212111131311.title: Yes

11111122223112121111313111.content:
Even before this mess the Girls still needed a Babysitter.

This Person has Babysat them for Years.

This Person is:

A. 18yo Chloe, who's been Babysitting them since she was 12(When Kacy was 4 and Lacy was 2)

B. 20yo Derek, who's been Babysitting them since he was 17(When Kacy was 7 and Lacy was 5)
11111122223112121111313111.title: It's their Regular Babysitter

111111222231121211113131111.content:
They Recognize Chloe as she walks into the den.

Is there anything weird about Chloe though?
111111222231121211113131111.title: Chloe

choices: 12/13(Around the time she First Babysat them)
1111112222311212111131311112.content:
They also Notice that Chloe is Younger Too!

They can still recognize her since they've known her for so long, but instead of 18 she looks:
1111112222311212111131311112.title: She's Younger Too!

choices: Take them for a nap / SE
11111122223112121111313111121.content:
They gasp when they see Chloe entering the room. They recognize her but are shocked to see that she's also gotten younger and can't be older than 13, the same age she began babysitting them some years ago.

Chloe doesn't seem to think anything is out of the ordinary and happily greets the girls. ''Hi girls, I'm gonna take care of you while your parents are away.'' she says and picks up Lacy and lifts her out of the playpen and then does the same to Kacy. She got the girls out of the playpen so she can...
11111122223112121111313111121.title: 12/13(Around the time she First Babysat them)

choices: Nope, They just get new Diapers
Thankfully, the Diapers look to just be for Bedtime and Naps
One of them gets out if Diapers
111111222231121211113131111211.content:
She sets the Girls on the Couch and grabs what they see is a Diaper Bag, pulling out a Towel and laying it out next to them.

"First things first, since you two Just gone done with your Nap, I bet the two of you have some Wet Diapies huh?" Chloe says.

She Lifts their dresses dress and confirms the two are Soaked.

"Yup, the two of you are Soaked. Which one of you wants to be changed first?" She says

The Girls Both Shout ME! But Lacy is A little faster.

Chloe has her Lie on the Towel and begins the Diaper Change.

Now since they Were Apparently Napping, do they get changed into diapers or was that just for Sleep?
111111222231121211113131111211.title: Check their diapers

choices: One has Panties, One has Pullups
1111112222311212111131311112112.content:
Luckily for the Girls, it seems they were only in Diapers because of Naptime.

Chloe changes them out of their Wet Diapers and Into:
1111112222311212111131311112112.title: Thankfully, the Diapers look to just be for Bed...

choices: Kacy has Panties, but Lacy still needs Pullups
Lacy gets Panties, but Kacy still needs Pullups
11111122223112121111313111121123.title: One has Panties, One has Pullups

111111222231121211113131111211231.content:
As Chloe changed Lacy out of her wet nap time diaper she held out a pull up for her to step into. Once Lacy was taken care of Chloe then turned her attention to Kacy. "Come on Kacy, let's go to your room and get you changed."

Kacy then followed her sitter to her room and Chloe changed Kacy out of her wet diaper and put her into a pair of sesame street themed panties. Chloe then brought the girls outside to play for a while since it was a beautiful day outside. The sisters ran around for about an hour until Chloe noticed something and called them over.

Chloe then said "come here you two, I smell something stinky and I know that it isn't me" as Kacy and Lacy both approached at the same time. Who does Chloe check first?
111111222231121211113131111211231.title: Kacy has Panties, but Lacy still needs Pullups

1111112222311212111131311112112311.content:
Naturally her first suspicion is Lacy, since she's still in Pull Ups. ''Okay, turn around'' Chloe says and reaches for the waistband of Lacy's Pull Up. ''Let's see if you've made a poopy...'' she says and pulls back the waistband and takes a peek. She looks surprised when she finds out that Lacy was still clean. ''Interesting...'' she says and then tells Kacy to move closer. When she sees that Kacy walks a bit funny and looks embarrassed she guesses what happened.

''So you're the stinky one, Kacy!'' she says and sees the girl blushing heavily. Kacy is mortified, she hadn't even noticed that she went number two in her pants. ''It's okay, accidents happen.'' Chloe comforts her and takes her to the bathroom to get cleaned up.

After cleaning her up, Chloe changes Kacy into a...
1111112222311212111131311112112311.title: Lacy

11111122223112121111313111121123111.content:
Chloe grabbed a pull up to change Kacy into since it was her parents rule that if she pooped her underwear, she would be in pull ups for the rest of the day. Kacy had gotten out of pull ups during the day full time just a few weeks ago so there was quite a few in the drawer next to her diapers.

Kacy was upset about having an accident but after Chloe cleaned her up she made macaroni and cheese for the girls to have for lunch. Did anything happen while the girls were eating?
11111122223112121111313111121123111.title: Pull Up

choices: They get a little Messy with their food
111111222231121211113131111211231111.content: What Happened while they were Eating?
111111222231121211113131111211231111.title: Yes

1111112222311212111131311112112311111.content:
The Girls are helped into their Booster Seats and are each given a bowl of Mac N Cheese and a Spork.

They start eating, a bit hesitant, but the first bite is unexpectedly good and they soon begin scarfing it down.

They even ask for seconds.

While eating their second bowls, something come up

Someone needs to Potty!

Who is it?
1111112222311212111131311112112311111.title: Someone needs to go Potty

11111122223112121111313111121123111112.content: As the girls were eating Lacy suddenly yelled "Chloe,I gotta go potty." Chloe then unbuckled Lacy from her booster seat and carried her to the nearest bathroom. Did Lacy make it in time?
11111122223112121111313111121123111112.title: Lacy

choices: Kacy gets another Diaper, but Lacy gets:
Lacy gets another Diaper, but Kacy gets:
1111112222311212111131311112113.content:
Luckily for one of the Sisters, she apparently only needs Diapers for Bedtime and Naps.

The Other isn't so Lucky.

Who's Who?
1111112222311212111131311112113.title: One of them gets out if Diapers

1111112222311212111132.content:
Interestingly, Being turned into Toddlers in Soaked Diapers doesn't cause the girls to freak out.

In fact, they don't seem to mind it at all!

Why?
1111112222311212111132.title: They don't seem to mind it too much

choices: Kacy and Lacy decide to play
11111122223112121111321.content:
The Sisters share a Secret.

Both of them like wearing Diapers!

Kacy was only 2 and still in diapers when Lacy was born(and wasn't fully potty trained until a little after her(Kacy's) 4th birthday).

But that didn't stop her from sneaking Diapers from Lacy until her little sister Finished Potty Training herself at 3 and a Half.

But the Supply of Diapers didn't dry up completely, it just became more Infrequent.

She started Sneaking them from visits to her Friends and Cousins Houses(Either from Younger Siblings or Bedwetters)

Unknown to her, Lacy was doing it too, and one day, Lacy found her Big Sister in the middle of doing it.

Kacy immediately started trying to hide her secret, but Lacy stopped her and revealed she was about to do the same.

From then on the two of them worked together, covering for eachother and sharing their stash.

Unfortunately, Kacy, despite being a bit petit for a girl her age, began to get too big to fit.

So them turning into Toddlers is kinda amazing.

Not only does it let Kacy fit in them again, Now they can wear them freely, AND they don't have to steal to get more, because the Diapers are FOR them!

What Happens Next?
11111122223112121111321.title: They missed wearing diapers

choices: They Think this has got to be a Dream/Nightmare
They have Different Opinions on what's Happening
1111112222311212111133.title: More Options

choices: Kacy hates it, Lacy isn't bothered by it
Kacy isn't bothered by it, Lacy Hates it
11111122223112121111332.content: The two of them have different opinions of the situation they find themselves in.
11111122223112121111332.title: They have Different Opinions on what's Happ...

choices: Sadly, Crying while Lacy Comforts her
111111222231121211113321.content:
Kacy is holding back tears upon realizing that not only is she a Diapered Toddler again, said diaper is SOAKED.

Lacy on the other hand doesn't seem too bothered by it.

However she does see her Big-Turned-Twin Sister isn't taking it as well and toddles over to her.

"What's Wrong Big Sis?" She asks.

Kacy Responds:
111111222231121211113321.title: Kacy hates it, Lacy isn't bothered by it

choices: Kacy is Diapered, Lacy's in Pullups

One of them is at least in Training Pants, but the other one is in Diapers.
(Also an Option for Kacy to be in Panties and Lacy in Diapers, because that was supposed to be an option)
11111122223112121131.title: One's Diapered, the other's in Training...

11111122223112121132.content: Now with both girls the same age they were both dressed in the same tee purple tee shirts and jean shorts but as both girls assessed each other it was clear that just like when they were both 3 respectively Lacy was in panties but Kacy was in thick daytime diapers.
11111122223112121132.title: One has Panties, the Other's Diapered

choices: Kacy starts to suck her thumb or can't talk like a big girl
111111222231121211322.content:
Kacy turned bright red and tried to cover her diaper bulge with a stuffed teddy bear. Lacy couldn't help but to laugh out loud. "Bwhaaaaa! Looks like your not the big sissy now, at least I'm potty trained! Hehehehe!" Lacy stifled her giggle seeing Kacy starting to tear up.
"Awe come on sissy you know you'd get a giggle too! Its ok we will be big again!" Lacy says hugging her sister, which Kacy returns the hug softly crying. "You don't understand when I was 3 I was a bigger baby than you think." Kacy is cut off by
111111222231121211322.title: Lacy laughs

111111222231121211323.content:
Before either one can react the door from the kitchen opens up and a young woman that couldn't be any older than 21, the tall blonde with a very womanly body comes into the den.
"Awe how are my two sleepy babies? I thought you two might sleep the Saturday away!"
"Who are you?" Lacy says as she stands up in the playpen with Kacy still sitting not exactly sure how to get up with such a thick diaper between her legs.
"I'm your babysitter Michelle, and you must be Lacy. (Michelle says ruffling Lucy's hair before taking her out of the play pen placing her feet first on the floor.) I heard from your mommy your a very big girl, already using the potty and being very smart." Lacy blushed as Michelle phrased the 3 years old for being such a big girl.
Michelle turned around and reached into the playpen the awaiting 3 year old. "And you must be little Kacy, your such a cutie! Your mommy told me all about you too! She told me your not ready for potty training and you love your binky." Michelle coos at the once oldest sister giving the toddler her pacifier.
111111222231121211323.title: A babysitter comes in

choices: Kacy has Panties, Lacy has Pullups
Kacy has Pullups, Lacy has Panties

Lacy finally wake up enough to make out her mother cooing like you would to a baby and could smell baby powder!
'What happened?!' She thinks to her self. Apon opening her eyes Lacy sees....
1111112222312.title: They're in one of their Rooms

1111132.content:
They girls decide to head upstairs first. Heading down the hallway to the left, they come across an open door.

Inside they see what appears to be a nursery, Painted Pink for a Baby Girl.

Is there anything odd about the Nursery?

choices: Feel tired and take a nap in the crib
Open up the pack of diapers
Both need to use the bathroom
11111321.content:
They don't notice anything odd, at least not yet. ''Hey look, it's a nursery!'' Lacy says as they walk into the room, which smells like baby powder. They look around and see a crib in the corner of the room and a sturdy, wooden changing table next to it. Kacy spots and unopened diaper pack on the changing table and tosses it to her sister. ''Here, you could probably use these, miss pee pants!'' she says, teasing her sister a little, making a reference to Lacy having a little wetting accident a little while ago.

''Shut up!'' Lacy retorts and tosses the diapers back to her sister, not liking to be reminded about having an accident. As they look around the room, the girls...
11111321.title: Not that they notice

111113212.content: They soon decide on diapering each other?
111113212.title: Open up the pack of diapers

choices: They wanna see if the diapers fit them
1111132122.content:
Lacy tears the package open and takes out a few diapers. ''What are you doing?'' Kacy asks her sister. ''Just taking a look'' Lacy answers as she unfolds one of the diapers and examines it. ''You should know a thing or two about those, it hasn't been that long since you still were in diapers'' Kacy says giggling.

''Yeah right, I got out of diapers earlier than you did, remember?'' Lacy says back and sticks out her tongue. ''Yeah but I didn't wear them to bed until I was 5, though.'' Kacy says.

Suddenly...
1111132122.title: Nah, SE

choices: Lacy jumped on the charging table
Kacy diapered Lacy on the floor
Lacy put the diaper on her self
11111321222.content:
Lacy scoffs at Kacy's comment, yeah she'd been out of diapers for only 2 and a half years but at least she was day time trained earlier than her big sister. It was no secret in the family that Kacy wasn't day time trained until almost 5!
Lacy felt the diaper it was soft, thick, crinkly, and smelled so clean and baby powder fresh, plus she loved the pink zebra stripes on it!

Kacy was still looking around at the different things in the nursery but notice Lacy was almost in a trance with the diaper still.
"Lacy! Would you put down those diapers and let's keep exploring!" Kacy said in a big sister tone.
The 8 year old looked up at her from the diaper but couldn't look away or put it down.
Finally Kacy got an idea... "I dare you to wear it!" She yelled out at her sister.
Lacy jumped being surprised by her sister yelling like that. "Why did you yell?! And what did you just say?"
Kacy smiled "I said I dare you to wear it, since you can't put it down you might as we put it on! Come on a dare is a dare!"
Lacy was always trying to keep up with her cool older sister and never wanted to look like a chicken. "Ugh fine. Ill do it but only til we get home!" Lacy agreed
Kacy giggled
11111321222.title: They wanna see if the diapers fit them

Why does it looks like that though?

choices: On the changing table and diaper her.

choices: Lacy stays normal, at least for now
1111132211.content:
''What are you doing?'' Lacy shrieks when Kacy suddenly picks her up and begins to carry her towards the crib. She manages to carry her younger sister over and lift her up enough to drop her in the crib. ''Ow, that hurt!'' Lacy complains as she tumbles into the crib. She scrambles to get into a sitting position in the surprisingly large crib. ''Aww, you look so cute in there'' Kacy giggles.

Now...
1111132211.title: In the crib.

11111322111.content: Suddenly, her clothes begin to change into baby clothes?
11111322111.title: Lacy's clothes begin to change

choices: Kacy gets lacy out of the crib
111113221111.content:
Kacy was laughing at her little joke she didn't realize Lacy wasn't enjoying joke, and now was scared as she watched and felt her clothes change. Her pink tee shirt, light blue jean shorts, pink frilly socks and pink sneakers all seemed to change and morph until the 8 year old was sitting in the over sized crib in a pink onesie tee, pink jean short alls, pink filly booties, and a obviously thick diaper underneath her new attire.
"Kacy I'm scared get me out of this!" Lacy said trembling.
Kacy looked up and couldn't believe what she was seeing! "Hhhhow'd you do that sissy?" Kacy said puzzled.
"I don't know but I want out! And I want me clothes back! NOW!" Lacy said swallowing her tears, feeling confused and scared.
111113221111.title: Yeah

choices: Both were put to sleep via a lullaby that begin playing.
1111132211112.content: Surprised, Kacy somehow fell into the crib. Did her clothes begin to change as well?
1111132211112.title: Kacy falls in the crib

11111322111121.content:
Kacy thought her baby sisters new outfit was funny but was also freaked out about how it happened, plus she knew Lacy was freaked out too!
"Hold on sissy I'll get you out of there!" Kacy say pushing a rocking horse up to the side of the crib to stand on so she could get enough leverage to pull Lacy out. But unfortunately when Kacy went to help Lacy over the rail Lacy lost her footing since her diaper was so thick it forced her legs apart, causing both girls to fall into the crib. Lacy felt like crying she felt like a big baby but before she could start to cry she saw her big sisters clothes began to change too. Before Kacy could get off her tummy she felt her clothes start to change and feel different.
11111322111121.title: Yup

choices: Lacy felt a pacifier in her mouth
111113221111211.content:
Kacy felt her panties thicken until they were thick training pants her jeans turned into white tights, her green shirt that said karate girl turned into a light pink short dress with a daisy on the front, not so after her shoes and socks became pink flats and frilly pink socks. Kacy sat up on the opposite side of the crib from her little sister to assess her own situation.
As Kacy looked at her dress and thick pullup lacy wanted to laugh but stopped when
111113221111211.title: Toddler clothes

111113221111213.content:
Kacy knew it wasn't good that she too was now in the crib, especially when she felt her clothes changing. Lacy watched in disbelief as Kacy's clothes went from a green tee shirt with the words karate girl on the front, blue jeans, and sneakers to a light pink fleece infant sleeper with a hood, and a very very thick diaper around her waist. Kacy could feel her legs were forced out and that she was inside something fuzzy soft and warm.
Kacy quickly crawled over in front of Kacy with tears in her eyes.

''Umm, could you come to the toilets...I have a bit of an situation...'' she says. Lacy is a bit confused but tells Kacy that she's on her way.

She gets there and knocks on the stall's door and Kacy lets her in. Lacy sees what's happened and can't help laughing a little when Kacy explains how it happened. She opens up her backpack and sees if she has anything for Kacy to wear now that her undies are ruined. Does she find anything?
112121111222222111111111222111.title: Call Lacy

112121111222222111111111222112.content:
"Hey mom,I have a problem "Kacy said as her mother was on the other side of the stall and said in a very concerned tone "what's wrong Kacy? " as Kacy opened the stall door and her mom immediately noticed her wet panties.

Kacy was worried but her mom said "don't worry about it, I came prepared just in case "as she reached into her large designer purse and pulled out two goodnites (one in Kacy's size and the other in Lacy's size) and a travel package of wipes. Kacy was surprised that their mom had pull ups with her but she was thankful as well.

Kacy got herself cleaned up and took a second to get over the embarrassment of wearing her night time protection during the day. Kacy then got her pull up on and then her leggings. Kacy was initially worried that her goodnite would be noticable but her top covered up most of her bottom.

Kacy's mom then grabbed her daughter's wet underwear and put them in a plastic bag to be washed when they get home. She then turned to Lacy who had an uncomfortable look on her face and asked her "Lacy do you need to go to the bathroom?" What did Lacy say?
112121111222222111111111222112.title: Call Mom

1121211112222221111111112221122.content:
''Umm, no...'' Lacy says, trying to sound as normal as possible. She actually had to pee, but didn't admit it. ''Well, let's go then.'' mom says and they go back shopping. Mom says she wants to go look for some clothes for herself and lets the girls roam freely for a while. ''Meet me here in one hour, okay?'' she says.

The girls happily go their way and just randomly explore stores. ''Let's go here!'' Lacy says and drags Kacy with her. ''Why are we in a store that sells baby stuff?'' Kacy says and giggles. ''Well we can look around, it's not like we have anything to do!'' Lacy answers and continues ''Follow me!'' and heads to the...
1121211112222221111111112221122.title: No

11212111122222211111111122211221.content:
Kacy saw that Lacy was leading her to the aisle that was stocked with diapers, pull ups, wipes, and just about everything else diaper related. Kacy then asked her "Lacy what are we doing in the diaper aisle "and Lacy said "I need something " as she strolled through the aisle and eventually said "here it is."

Lacy bent down and picked something off of the bottom shelf. When she approached Kacy, Kacy noticed that her sister had grabbed...
11212111122222211111111122211221.title: Diaper aisle

choices: Put the diapers away and move on
112121111222222111111111222112211.content:
''What do you need that for?'' Kacy asks, giggling. ''Well duh, what do you think?'' she says and continues ''I don't wanna get a rash on my butt'' Kacy can't help laughing at her sister's answer, but at the same time she wonders if Lacy is going to wear Pull Ups for a longer time if she's worrying about possible diaper rash.

Kacy then keeps looking through the stuff, looking excited. ''Hey look!'' she says and grabs a package from the shelf. It's a package of tape on diapers, with size labeled as XL+ and the test ''extra absorbent, for day and night use.'' They appear similar to baby diapers but meant for bigger children who still need protection.

Do the girls...
112121111222222111111111222112211.title: Rash cream

choices: She was changing her pull up
